column4: ET:quakewars, quake3, ut2k4, doom3 - these have native linux clients
but if i use wine. joysticks wont work?
joysticks should work if your joystick controlled is supported which is most prob is, however I wouldn't warrant than any special features of said joystick that depend on windows software will work
your best bet if you are concerned is to google the model and linux to see what other's experiences have been
